summary: This is a mod that adds spells if you want to know more enter the mods description
descriptionHtml:
[font=Arial][size=3]

                                                             [color=#ff0000][size=6]Determination Spell Pack[/size][/color]


Update* OK so after about six months of procrastinating im finally gonna start working on a remake of this because i want it tobe original so the next update will probably be the new version also why is this crappy mod getting so many downloads

[color=#ff0000]Mods content[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Determination[/color] - an overpowered healing spell - 10000 health - 1000 magicka - 10000 stamina
[color=#ff7700]Bravery[/color] - the equivalent of jet from fallout - slows time - speeds up attacks
[color=#00ff00]Kindness[/color] - A healing hands type of spell - nothing special about it really besides healing a lot of health quickly
[color=#ffff00]Justice[/color] - an offensive ice spell that does fire, shock and ice damage - crazy right?
[color=#00ffff]Patience[/color] - a spell that makes the player invisible for ten seconds - regenerates health & stamina - also slows time for a minute
[/size][/font][color=#0000ff][size=3][font=Arial]Integrity[/font][/size][/color][font=Arial][size=3] - adds defense to player - increases damage in combat
[color=#9900ff]Perseverance[/color] - shows path to current objective - fills stamina - shows nearby life
[color=#ff00ff]Fear [color=#ffffff]- paralyzes nearby entities
[color=#000000]Hate [color=#ffffff]- your bottled up hatred explodes in a fiery ball of magic[/color][/color][/color][/color]

[color=#ff00ff]Change Logs[/color]
0.8 - Added [color=#ff00ff]Fear [color=#ffffff]- [color=#000000]Hate[/color][/color][/color]
0.7 - Added [color=#9900ff]Perseverance[/color] - fixed some bugs with [color=#00ffff]patience[/color]
0.6 - Added [color=#0000ff]Integrity[/color]
0.5 - Added [color=#00ffff]Patience[/color]
0.4 - Added [color=#ffff00]Justice[/color]
0.3 - Added [color=#00ff00]Kindness[/color]
0.2 - Added [color=#ff7700]Bravery[/color]
0.1 - Filled the nexus with [color=#ff0000]Determination[/color]

[color=#ff7700]Plans[/color]
Add [font=Comic Sans MS]amalgamates[/font]
other plans that i might come up with in the future
[color=#9900ff]
Location[/color]
spelltomes can be found on a shelf in Breezehome
non-canon spells can be found in the hall of the dead in whiterun on top of a coffin

[color=#0000ff]Daily dosage of pun[/color]
shoots a chicken and loots the body for eggs
[font=Comic Sans MS]*This mods gonna be EGGcelent[/font]
then procedes to run from all of skyrim as they avenge the chicken
[color=#00ffff]
Final message to reader[/color]
so close to making a proper spell pack so stay tuned
also feel free to post your opinion in the comments
so overpowered i hope you enjoy :3[/size][/font]
author: PendaAnimations

files.name: Determination spell pack Original seven souls
